column1: Reimu! Reimu! These shooting stars seem to bear some great magical power.
Even if you say that…, it's way too late…
Ah, right now, I just want to lie down in my shrine…
Don't be like that! Cheer up.
Ah! Hellooooo!
Oh, hey, there!
Seems like we've found the culprit.
Well, it might seem that way, but I'm nooot.
Okay then, let's quickly beat her up and head back to sleep.
Did you also want to come to my party?
What party? You mean now?
Oh, the party's about to begin!
I'm sorry, but we have things to do, and we'd like to hurry,
so please let us pass with no issue.
Okay! You can take your needle with you and stay for the party.
I'm going back to sleep.
Reimu!
No, I'll need two more people.
But if you're busy, then
I've prepared a party for busy people, toooooo!
Seems like we have to exterminate you.
Seems like we have to exterminate you.
Let's go, Shinmyoumaru!
